column2: BRIEF-Enersys Q4 Preliminary Reported Net Earnings Per Share $1.27 May 16 (Reuters) - EnerSys: * REPORTS PRELIMINARY FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR FISCAL 2018 RESULTS * QTRLY PRELIMINARY NON-GAAP ADJUSTED NET EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.24 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.23 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
